title: Strengthening Patient Care Competencies: Instructional Design for Self-Regulated Learning in Blended Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain seven self-regulated learning support attributes (authenticity, personalization, learner control, scaffolding, interaction, reflection induction, and adjustment signaling) in blended learning environments.
Learners can create learning plans applying self-regulated learning strategies in mobile microlearning environments.
Learners can apply learning designs reflecting self-regulated learning support attributes through project-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
